bioAsHtml: Software architect with vast experience in the fin-tech space. Special interest in performance tuning, monitoring, operational intelligence and their link with agile methodologies. Working currently for clear2pay on the architecture of their core frameworks and part of the r&d team. In the past teamlead and lead architect for the Isabel corporate ebanking platform.

acceptedTalks.title: Hands-on with JMH, become a benchmarking expert in 30 minutes!

bio:
Software architect with vast experience in the fin-tech space. Special interest in performance tuning, monitoring, operational intelligence and their link with agile methodologies.
Working currently for clear2pay on the architecture of their core frameworks and part of the r&d team.  In the past teamlead and lead architect for the Isabel corporate ebanking platform.
